candidates.why: Exact oracle command doc referenced by requirements; defines parameters, type/category taxonomy, interactive mode, and artifacts.
Creates/updates .workflow/project-guidelines.json scaffold; provides baseline structure and write patterns for guidelines.
Downstream consumer of project-guidelines.json (loads conventions/constraints/learnings into context-package.json).
Session-family command patterns (auto mode, guardrails, and .workflow state initialization).
Planning flow integration point; solidified guidelines must influence planning outputs consistently.

selected.why: Oracle reference for this command; gap analysis should compare generated outline against it without leaking full contents into the spec.
